docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 18--A new joint military defense plan was approved today by the InterAmerican Defense Board, representing twenty-one countries in the Western Hemisphere.

docs.abstract: Inter-Amer Defense Bd revises hemisphere defense plan; strategy reptdly still based on premise of danger of attack from USSR

docs.snippet: HOT SPRINGS, Va., July 18 (UP)--Three teams fired four-under-par 70's today to share the opening-round lead in the $7,500 Hot springs women's four-ball golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: HOT SPRINGS, Va., July 18 (UP)--Three teams fired four-under-par 70's today to share the opening-round lead in the $7,500 Hot springs women's four-ball golf tournament.

headline.main: THREE TEAMS TIE WITH CARDS OF 70; Gloria Fecht and Wiffi Smith Among Duos Sharing Lead in Golf at Hot Springs
FAY CROCKER'S PAIR FIRST ON 69 FOR 140

docs.snippet: HOT SPRINGS, Va., July 20 (UP)--Louise Suggs of Sea Island, Ga., and Mickey Wright of San Diego today shot a sparkling 69 to take the 54-hole lead in the 72-hole, $7,500 Hot Springs four-ball women's golf tournament with a score of 210.
docs.lead_paragraph: HOT SPRINGS, Va., July 20 (UP)--Louise Suggs of Sea Island, Ga., and Mickey Wright of San Diego today shot a sparkling 69 to take the 54-hole lead in the 72-hole, $7,500 Hot Springs four-ball women's golf tournament with a score of 210.

headline.main: MISS SUGGS' TEAM LEADS BY 5 SHOTS; She and Miss Wright Post 69 for 210 in Hot Springs Four-Ball Tourney
